name: Daddy-Dino
description:
Global Game Jam 2019 entry. 

A simple game about a child wearing a onsie play-fighting their dad while wearing a cardboard dinosaur costume.

Join forces with your friends to take down the formidable foe. 

Check out the GGJ site to see other contributors:
https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/daddy-dino
